meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Chancellor May Stay On The interim schools chancellor, Harold O. Levy, is expected to seek the job permanently and appears to be the front-runner. PAGE BI
Chancellor May Stay On The interim schools chancellor, Harold O. Levy, is expected to seek the job permanently and appears to be the front-runner. PAGE BI
Easing Grip on Elian Cuban-Americans in Miami appeared to concede that they had lost the battle to keep Elian Gonzalez from his father. PAGE A22
Seoul Relieved, but Wary There was a wide range of emotions as South Koreans learned of plans for the first summit meeting with the Communist North. PAGE A6
Disputing Use of Vitamins A new report says there is no evidence that large doses of vitamins C and E and other antioxidants can prevent chronic disease. PAGE A20
Stadium Opener Postponed The Yanks have called off today's home opener against Texas and rescheduled it for 1:05 p.m. tomorrow. SPORTSTUESDAY, PAGE D2
